name: Modern Air Attack: Air War Online Multiplayer
name_original: Modern Air Attack: Air War Online Multiplayer
description:
*** THE ULTIMATE MODERN AIR COMBAT IN MULTIPLAYER MODE ***
Dominate the sky in this modern air fight and be the super pilot. You will be able to fight on all the best known pursuit planes and airborne interceptors of future generation.

Not only you could show your clever fighting way to your enemy but also you got varied weapons to fight in any situation.

Play the game in single player or multiplayer mode. Upgrade your planes, missiles and guns for better damage and stand against strong enemies. Gameplay becomes more and more challenging as enemy approach you faster and faster.

*** UNIQUE GAME FEATURES ***
* 6 High Detail planes with modern weapon systems
* 5 Amazingly great and realistic battle fields
* Simple and user friendly user interface
* Practice mode and single player mode available to enhance your flying skills


*** UNIQUE MULTIPLAYER FEATURES ***
* Join high speed servers from all over the world
* Ability to create private and public rooms
* Unique features like kick player from room or make someone a host
* Live chat in lobby and in gameplay

So download this multiplayer modern air combat and master the sky.
